product_title: Medium Mailbox Leather Top Handle Bag
product_description: Designed with a trapezoidal shape and the sleek lines of a mailbox, this grained-calfskin tote easily holds your all personal belongings and documents.
product_details_and_care:
Designed with a trapezoidal shape and the sleek lines of a mailbox, this grained-calfskin tote easily holds your all personal belongings and documents. Rolled top handles and a detachable shoulder strap send you off in style.
Top zip closure
Top carry handle; removable, adjustable shoulder strap
Exterior zip pocket
Interior zip, wall and smartphone pockets; key ring
Structured silhouette with flat base for stability
Logo-jacquard lining
Leather
Imported
Item #6104693
product_size_info:
10 1/2”W x 9”H x 6”D. (Interior capacity: medium.)
5 1/2” strap drop; 20” shoulder strap drop.
1.60 lbs.
